page.title: 04CLUBS FOR CHILDREN
page.content: THE GIRLS IN OUR CLASSES ATTEND VARIOUS CLUBS OUT OF SCHOOL HOURS. THESE ARE USUALLY FOR LEARNING NEW SKILLS LIKE{RIDING CLUBS, NETBALL {CLUBS,}VARIOUS TYPES OF DANCING INCLUDING{MORRIS DANCING.}A FEW ATTEND {GIRL GUIDES}WHICH IS A WORLD WIDE ORGANISATION FOR GIRLS AGED 10 YEARS TO 14 YEARS. THE BOYS IN OUR CLASSES ALSO ATTEND CLUBS. MOST OF THE BOYS GO TO{1ST {ASTLEY CUBS}AND THEIR FOOTBALL TEAM HAS WON 6 CUPS. SOME BOYS GO TO{180 {BREAKDANCING CLUB}IN TYLDESLEY. SOME BOYS DO NOT GO TO ANY CLUBS. ONE BOY GOES TO A SNOOKER CLUB IN WORSLEY. MOST OF THE CHILDREN IN THE CLASSES ARE MEMBERS OF THE{WELEPHANT CLUB WHICH IS RUN BY THE FIRE SERVICE.
